name: Rytmik Player
description: Listen, rate and share more than 6.000 songs created in Rytmik Ultimate stored on Rytmik Cloud.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Single Core 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card supporting DirectX with 64 MB of memory Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: A compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card supporting DirectX with 64 MB of memory Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: A compatible sound card
